thread.title: Gordon S
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Gordon S

author: Gordon S
title: Gordon S
text:
Really fantastic shopping experience. The prices are also great.
I made a mistake with the order. Country Attire handled my mistake with superb efficiency. The item arrived well before I expected and they use a really good delivery company that do not lose your parcels.
Quite simply I am now a permanent customer.
Thank you
